titlestmt.titleproper: Stamps and postcards relating to money, 1975

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Stamps and postcards relating to money
did.abstract: Stamps and postcards relating to money.
did.physloc: ANS Rare Book Room - Archives Pamphlet 2

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Block of four US ten cents postage stamps issued in 1975. These se-tenant commemorative stamps were designed to focus attention on the role that banking and commerce played in the development of the United States. There are two different stamp designs that when put together complete the picture of currency and coins. Three souvenir postcards from Casa Nacional de Moneda, Mexico’s mint museum, depicting various historical minting apparatus and coins produced therefrom, undated.

userestrict.head: Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.
